alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Ellis; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 1:32AM CDT until July 09 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Northwestern Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 131 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Shattuck to 5 miles east of Lake Marvin to 7 miles east of Lora, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Arnett, Reydon, Sweetwater, Strong City, Texola, Crawford, Roll, Durham, Berlin, and Dempsey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
